decision_conditions: No Pre App - Complied Amendments Yes
application_type_full: Prior Approval: Change of use from Commercial, Business and Service (Use Class E) to Dwellinghouses (Use Class C3)
description: Prior approval for change of use from offices (Use Class E(g)(i)) to residential (Use Class C3) to create 192 residential units comprising 126 one-bedroom one-person flats, 43 one-bedroom two-person flats, 11 two-bedroom three-person flats and 12 two-bedroom four-person flats under Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
